hint.login: Allows the user to log in
hint.self-edit: Lets the user change their password, update their email and manage 2FA for their account
hint.settings-edit: Allows editing global panel settings like master url, email integration etc
hint.servers-list: Lets the user see a list of all servers they have access to

ServersFiles: Allow access to files using SFTP
ServersFilesGet: View and download files using the file manager
ServersFilesPut: Edit and upload files using the file manager
ServersEditUsers: Edit user's access to this server
